param.name: showall
param.label: Show all locations by default?
param.description: Show all locations by default

param.name: showemptymap
param.label: Show empty map?
param.description: Show the map when no locations are found or all are not shown by default

param.name: article
param.label: Intro article
param.description: Choose an article to display above the locator form

param.name: postal_code_label
param.label: Default postal code label
param.description: The label of the primary location search field. You can use: [Postal Code], [City, State] or both. This search is geocoded on demand and the resulting lat/lng are used as the center of the radius search. Since Google Maps Geocoder is used for this process, nearly any complete location search will provide valid results.

param.name: tag_label
param.label: Default tag label
param.description: The label of the tag search field. You may choose to label tags as 'Category' etc.

param.name: list_length
param.label: Maximum number of Results Per Page
param.description: The number of results to show per page. Should not exceed 500 for map layouts.

param.name: page_list
param.label: List of available numbers of Results Per Page
param.description: The number of results to show per page. Should not exceed 500 for map layouts.

param.name: page_list_default
param.label: Default number of Results Per Page
param.description: The number of results to show per page. Should not exceed 500 for map layouts.

param.name: maxresults
param.label: Maximum number of results
param.description: The maximum number of search results to display. Leave blank for unlimited.

param.name: showkeywordform
param.label: Show keyword search form?
param.description: Show keyword code search form

param.name: centeronresults
param.label: Center Map on results?
param.description: Automatically zooms and pans the search results map display to best fit the search results.

param.name: use_ssl
param.label: Use SSL for Maps
param.description: Uses SSL for map display

param.name: gmap_initial_lat
param.label: Initial Map Center Latitude
param.description: (Ex. 41.397) The initial center latitude of the map. This is not overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: gmap_initial_lng
param.label: Initial Map Center Longitude
param.description: (Ex. -96.644) The initial center Longitude of the map. This is not overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: gmap_initial_zoom
param.label: Initial Map Zoom
param.description: (Ex 4) The initial zoom level of the map (1-10). This is not overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: gmap_default_lat
param.label: Map Center Latitude
param.description: The center latitude of the map. This can be overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: gmap_default_lng
param.label: Map Center Longitude
param.description: The center Longitude of the map. This can be overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: gmap_default_zoom
param.label: Map Zoom
param.description: The default zoom level of the map (1-10). This can be overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: linktarget
param.label: Open link in new window?
param.description: This will set the entry's link to open in a new window. This controls only the behavior of the item's link field.

param.name: linkhttp
param.label: Add HTTP to link?
param.description: This add http:// to the link

param.name: triggercontentplugin
param.label: Trigger content plugins?
param.description: This will execute content preparation plugins on each directory entry. May cause performance degradation with many plugins

param.name: distance_unit
param.label: Measure in KM or Miles
param.description: When searching for locations near a postal code, use Kilometres or Miles

param.name: show_directions
param.label: Show Directions?
param.description: Show a link on the google map info window to directions

param.name: showintroonly
param.label: Show only introtext of description?
param.description: This will prevent text after the Joomla system readmore from being displayed on the search results page

param.name: zoomlevelonsingle
param.label: Zoom Level on Single Result:
param.description: When a single search result is found, the default Google zoom level is often too close(20). This allows you to set it to a more useful level

param.description: Show postal code search form

param.description: Show drop-down list of tags

param.description: Show a drop-down list of tags for each group

param.name: showtagcheckboxes

param.description: Show a list of checkboxes for each tag in groups

param.name: defaultmapview
param.label: Default Map View
param.description: Sets the default type of Google Map display

param.name: clusterer
param.label: Cluster Map Markers?
param.description: This option is useful when you have many markers. It clusters the markers into clickable groups.

param.name: cluster_zoom
param.label: Cluster Zoom?
param.description: The max zoom level monitored by a marker cluster. If not given, the marker cluster assumes the maximum map zoom level. When maxZoom is reached or exceeded all markers will be shown without cluster.

param.name: cluster_gridsize
param.label: Cluster Grid Size?
param.description: The grid size of a cluster in pixel. Each cluster will be a square. If you want the algorithm to run faster, you can set this value larger. The default value is 60.

param.name: linktarget
param.label: Open link in new window?
param.description: This will set the entry's link to open in a new window. This controls only the behavior of the item's link field.

param.name: gmap_width
param.label: Map Width
param.description: The CSS width of the map. It can be in percent (as in 80%) or pixels (as in 550px).

param.name: gmap_height
param.label: Map Height
param.description: Map height in pixels (E.g: 500). This can be overridden by the Menu item parameters.

param.name: map_address_template
param.label: Map popup item address format
param.description: The format of the address and information that appears in the Google Map popup window. Fields are lowercase and in curly brackets. HTML Tags are in square brackets, (E.g. [br][p][/p]) Items with a [br] tag directly after them (no spaces) that are blank will also omit the the [br] tag

param.name: form_template
param.label: Search form format
param.description: The format and arrangement of the search form fields on the main search interface

param.name: linktoitempage
param.label: Hyperlink title to item page?
param.description: This will create a link to a location-specific page which shows the complete location details (fulltext).

param.name: showmaponitempage
param.label: Show map on item page?
param.description: Shows a small map with the marker on the item page.

param.name: address_template
param.label: Item address format
param.description: The format of the address to display on the individual item page. Fields are lowercase and in curly brackets. HTML Tags are in square brackets, (E.g. [br][p][/p]) Items with a [br] tag directly after them (no spaces) that are blank will also omit the the [br] tag

param.name: item_address_template
param.label: Item address format
param.description: The format of the address to display on the individual item page. Fields are lowercase and in curly brackets. HTML Tags are in square brackets, (E.g. [br][p][/p]) Items with a [br] tag directly after them (no spaces) that are blank will also omit the the [br] tag

param.name: item_map_address_template
param.label: Item page Map popup address format
param.description: The format of the address in the Map Marker. Fields are lowercase and in curly brackets. HTML Tags are in square brackets, (E.g. [br][p][/p]) Items with a [br] tag directly after them (no spaces) that are blank will also omit the the [br] tag

param.name: showmarkeronitempage
param.label: Popup marker on item page?
param.description: Shows a small marker info window in the map by default.

param.label: Item Page Map Zoom
param.description: Default Zoom of the map on the item page

param.name: item_gmap_width
param.label: Item Page Map Width
param.description: Map width in pixels of the map displayed on the individual location's page (E.g: 500).

param.name: item_gmap_height
param.label: Item Page Map Height
param.description: Map height in pixels of the map displayed on the individual location's page (E.g: 500).

param.name: force_match
param.label: Force distance match on postal code?
param.description: ADVANCED ONLY: Setting this to 'Yes' will force postal code matches to match on searches for the same postal code regardless of distance and/or proximity to another postal code

param.label: Google Maps Base Language
param.description: See Google Supported Lanaguages for supported languages
